title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.11 - Use of terminal equipment and machinery restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.11 - Use of terminal equipment and machinery restricted

State Regulations

Heater valves, sprinkler valves and devices, blower
motors or any other air terminal machinery or equipment shall not be tampered
with at any time. No person other than an authorized airport operator employee
shall turn heaters in public areas on and off or operate any other aiport
equipment, except in leased areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1272.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
